title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 560.4 - Filing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 560.4 - Filing

State Regulations

This Part and any rules and regulations promulgated by a
college council and approved by a campus president or designee, or by the Board
of Trustees, as the case may be shall be filed: (a) in the office of the Secretary of

State; (b) in the office of the
clerk of the city, town or village in which the premises of the State- operated
institutions are located; and
(c) in the office of the campus security director or such other location, as may be
designated by the campus president or designee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
560.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
